channel.title: Mystic: you linked with %X%
channel.description:
#### What happened: Each time As a mystic I link with a person at the end it says "You linked your mind with %X%". No names or numbers just %X%
#### Steps to reproduce: Play a mystic and link a person at night
#### Comments: Each and every time I play a mystic and link with a person I get the same msg "You linked your mind with %X%"

item.title: Mystic: you linked with %X%
item.dc:creator: Napoleon
item.description:
This bug is said to be pending fixed so it should be fixed in the next patch.

Read full topic
